name: SPAM JAM - part 01
description:
S P A M

Speed

Playfullness

Authenticity

Meaning

This is the result of a 2 day game jam. 

We where 4 people and we did everything: Music, modeling, writing etc.

Its more of a test, or perhaps a trailer, than a final product.

However we hope you enjoy the experience anyway! :)

WASD + mouse for controles, and 'R ' to change the radiostation!

and remember to play in fullscreen  mode :)
